ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | relogcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) |
| 2 |  | relogmuld.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_relogmul | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( log ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( log ` A ) + ( log ` B ) ) ) |
